sense.def:
Oseba, ki je
cunning
, je prebrisana in goljufiva.

seg.quote: He knew nothing of the cunning means employed to get him out of his job.

sense.def:
Cunning
je sposobnost prebrisanega načrtovanja, pogosto z namenom, da bi koga prevarali.

seg.quote: They achieved their aim by stealth and cunning.
